channel.title: Need help with mopar client(messing up) pmgz look!
channel.description: i downloaded mopar..re downloaded and everything i go to runmoparscape.bat and i get this: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:52) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\cache.zip (Access i s denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:126) at Update.<init>(Update.java:34) at client.method67(client.java:3128) at client.method6(client.java:6228) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43) at client.run(client.java:4081) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting. Press any key to continue . . . any1 know how to fix?

item.title: Need help with mopar client(messing up) pmgz look!
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

CANT make sure the disk is not full or write-protected and that the files is not currently in use[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 06:10:56 PM[/size][hr]can u help pmgz…

item.title: Need help with mopar client(messing up) pmgz look!
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

Eww, Hex.

Umm go to this directory in My Computer.

C:\WINDOWS

and look for:

.mpr_file_store_32

and delete that folder, and try again to download the cache.

folder. Then restart MoparScape.
